resources.string: Server didn\'t accept your credentials. Check your login/password
An error occurred while trying to connect to server.
Server didn\'t respond. Try again later.
An unknown error occurred. Try checking your internet connection, or try again later
Server didn\'t accept your token. You can get a new one by opening settings and re-logging in
Server didn\'t accept your token. You can try to clear app data and login again.
You have no lessons today. Have a rest :)
You have no lessons tomorrow. You can rest :)
1. You need to send this file to token holder (person, that sharing token).
2. After you got encrypted token (file, that token holder sent to you), you need to select it down here.
Input file is not valid token file.
Server didn\'t accept this shared token. Ask token holder to recreate token file.
Token is successfully unencrypted! You can now apply it.
We are sorry, but some unrecoverable error occured. Developer of the app was notified about this. Please, try to restart the app.
Here is some information for developer: \n
